intro: Psychotria brachyblastus, commonly known as the short-stalked psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in humid lowland forests. The species is notable for its chemical composition, which includes various alkaloids.
